replies.body: If we're focusing solely on how much damage Riven was able to mitigate, most of that probably came from her shield and the over-shield that Bloodthirster gives. Any damage dealt while at max health with a Bloodthirster equipped will give you a temporary shield while in combat.

Does the self-mitigated damage stat only increase once damage is absorbed by the shield, or does that stat increase on shield use? Like, if Riven uses her shield to dash away, is the full shield value added to the recap stat? Or if she takes 0 incoming attacks in that scenario, is 0 added to the recap stat?
I'm preeeeeetty sure that stat only increases when her shield is actually damaged. If her shield is never damaged, I think the recap would show 0.
thank you for that brand new information, she did all this while being chain cc'd and being focus'd i can suybmit the replay for you if you would like so you can see first hand how "balanced" she is
